title: Who is the god of music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Saraswati is considered to be the godess of music. Narada maharishi son of lord brahma is one of the propagator of bhakti rasa. The adbhuta ramayana also speaks of each raaga being a god or godess. Gandharvas also are considered to be celestial musicians. Krishnas flute, meenakshis gayana, in short all gods love music.However Saraswati is considered to be the patron godess of arts and music generally
